newsitem.title: USA: Estimated $13.5 billion flowed to stock funds in April.
newsitem.headline: Estimated $13.5 billion flowed to stock funds in April.

text.p: Investors poured an estimated $13.5 billion into stock mutual funds in April, up from $10.5 billion in March, a mutual fund industry trade group said on Thursday.
At the same time, the Investment Company Institute said the estimated flow to bond and income funds was nil last month after investors withdrew $1.99 billion in March.
The monthly estimates are derived from unpublished weekly estimates based on a survey of long-term funds that account for about 97 percent of long-term mutual fund assets, the ICI said.
